Desc.entry: Part of NHS Sheffield. Provides general and specialist podiatry treatment in Sheffield, based on clinical/medical need. Services include nail surgery, podiatric surgery, community and hospital based diabetes care, rheumatology clinics and special needs clinics. All referrals are triaged by a senior podiatrist and offered an assessment appointment according to risk status. High risk patients are seen within 2 weeks of receipt of referral and low risk patients within 12 weeks. Also takes self referrals. Services are provided in community clinics, some GP clinics, hospitals, a mobile clinic and at home for housebound patients.
